info.name: Minimalistically forecast.io
info.description: Less stuff, more minimalism for forecast.io
info.additionalInfo: Important advices before install For changing the location, click in the concerned area then type the place of your choice. Also, as this userstyle hide the temperatures units selection (°F/°C), please select the one used before installing this CSS. Updates 2014/12/29 • Fixed bounding of main forecast info area when two-digits negative temperature is encountered 2014/10/26 • Fixed displayed fonts stack (Segoe UI used by default, or Helvetica Neue as fallback for Mac users) 2014/04/26 • Original release
